Hey uploader alexisthebest..

Plz give detailed instructions on how to install and run this game???

I have Smash Cars.exe  and NFO.exe  files.. What to do now???

If you get this ERROR


Application run-time error!Unhandled exception at 0x006856f6 : 0xC0000005: Access violation reading location 0x00000000."Callstack(most recent call first(0x006856F6:(n/a)


THE FIX:Go to options menu in the game > turn off PostProcess Quality.Now it should work no problem

If you get this ERRORApplication run-time error!Unhandled exception at 0x006856f6 : 0xC0000005: Access violation reading location 0x00000000."Callstack(most recent call first(0x006856F6:(n/a)  


THE FIX:Goto options menu in the game & turn off PostProcess Quality.Now it should work no problem
